Home.name: Fabian Åkesson
Home.aboutParagraph:
I began my journey in software development by diving into programming with Unity and C#. This led to a role as a software development consultant at Ericsson AB in Karlskrona, where I worked with Java, JavaScript, and related technologies.

Today, I work as a fullstack developer and consultant at Avalon Innovation. I have been involved in several projects with varying tech stacks and environments. I always strive to grow and experiment with new technologies and approaches to deliver modern, sustainable solutions.
